body.name: AOKLY 12V 7Ah Replacement Battery Rechargeable Sealed Lead Acid SLA AGM Power Source Maintenance Free
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 10 hrs 45 mins
features: AGM Technology - AKY-SLA008 is a sealed lead acid battery, also known as an AGM battery. AGM (Absorbent Glass Mat) technology relies on the use of fibreglass mat between the lead plates which absorbs the sulphuric acid, making the battery spill-proof.

Product Features - Aokly 12v 7ah has low self-discharge rate, wide application temperature range, completely sealed and maintenance-free, good electrical conductivity, charging acceptance ability, safe and reliable explosion-proof exhaust system and other thermal properties.
Extensively Applicable - The handy size makes it convenient for many popular applications such as security systems and garden tools.

Manufacturer Directly - an experienced battery manufacturer who has served global markets for over 25 years, we provide high efficiency batteries with the highest quality of materials and available and the most advanced technologies.
Worry Free Purchase - As part of our ISO 9001 quality procedure, quality control tests are frequently carried out on all our products. Our warranty is extended to 12 months.
body.description: DIMENSIONS Standard Size The 12v 7ah rechargeable battery has a standard size, which makes it a proper replacement for batteries on scooter, deer feeder, fish finder, cable boxes, home ADT alarm systems and so many more. manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 12V 7Ah Univesal Battery The 6fm7 12v7ah 20hr model is a 12 volt 7 ampere hour battery, specifically engineered for use in general purpose float and light cyclic applications including fire and security systems, emergency lighting, UPS, toys and medical devices. Its standard size makes it a proper replacement for batteries on scooter, deer feeder, fish finder, cable boxes and home ADT alarm systems.

VRLA AGM Technology & Premium Material The AGM (absorbent glass mat) technology of this valve regulated lead acid battery delivers superior maintenance free performance and high energy density. Rugged impact resistant ABS case and valve regulated spill-proof construction allow safe operation in any orientation (excluding continuous inverted use).

F2 Terminals Quick disconnect tabs, 0.250" x 0.032" DIMENSIONS Standard Size The 12v 7ah rechargeable battery has a standard size, which makes it a proper replacement for batteries on scooter, deer feeder, fish finder, cable boxes, home ADT alarm systems and so many more. L: 5.95 in. (151mm) W: 2.56 in. (65mm) H: 3.70 in. (94mm) HT: 3.86 in. (98mm)

Rechargeable Sealed Lead Acid Battery – General Purpose Series CHARGING Cycle Applications: Apply constant voltage charge at 2.35v/c – 2.45v/c (14.1 – 14.7v for 12v Monobloc) at 20°C. Initial charging current should be set at less than 0.25C Amps. Switch to float charge to avoid overcharging. “Float” or “Stand-By” Service: Apply constant voltage charge of 2.25v/c 2.30v/c (13.5 to 13.8 volts for 12v Monobloc at 20°C. When held at this voltage, the battery will seek its own current level and maintain itself in a fully charged condition. Temperature Compensation: Charging Voltage for both Cyclic and Standby applications should be regulated in relation to ambient temperature. As temperature rises charging voltage should be reduced to prevent overcharge and increased as temperature falls to avoid undercharge.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worked as expected
reviews.reviewText: This did exactly what it was supposed to do. Worked charged out of the box and was a direct replacement for what was there before.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great replacement of my security systems

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: i bought this for a mini bike that has no power to it so this was going to give it headlight and tail lights. it worked out great. the charge lasts forever and i can charge it up with any car charger. well worth the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nicely made battery
reviews.reviewText: This is a nicely made battery. Perfect for use in a backup power supply or other device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Perfect replacement battery for an APC 500 UPS.
reviews.reviewText: I got a few APC 500 UPS units at a close-out sale, and the only thing wrong with them is they all need new batteries. This battery seems like a good choice - it has 1Ah more capacity, fits the units perfectly, and is budget-friendly. It arrived fully charged as my charger indicated full almost immediately after connecting it. The battery manufacture date is about 7 months ago, so it's relatively "fresh". A test run of this in the UPS with just my monitor and desktop plugged into it kept them running for about 25 minutes when I unplugged it, which I consider pretty good! The seller offers a 12 month warranty, so that will give me plenty of time to gauge the longevity and to tell if there's any degradation in capacity. As of right now I would recommend this battery, particulary since it fit the UPS just like the original, and the price is right! If it gives a few years service, I'll consider it a great deal.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars All good, for now
reviews.reviewText: This is the only such battery that came with a leaflet with technical data and instructions – kudos for showing concern and providing detailed info on the technical characteristics. The instructions have several types of batteries listed, and this one is included under “12V series”. There is a typo on the “Attentions” section: “Store the battery in a cool place (best below 20C or 68C)” – they mean “68F”.The battery got charged on a basic 12V charger with no fuss, and the load tester shows it within the good range for its size and construction, all good.The real test for quality in these batteries, from what I’ve seen, is longevity: real good ones tend to last 6 years and more under normal use, while I have seen others last for less than two years, all in the same price range. This battery has a 12 months warranty, so at least there is assurance against a total lemon. But I cannot rate it yet for longevity.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nicely packed, good price, and a 5 star battery in my opinion.
reviews.reviewText: This battery looks to be a good choice for a UPS (uninterruptible power supply).The fit is perfect, the UPS seems happy with it, and I expect this to last a few years before needing replacement.The open-circuit voltage out of the box is 13.04 volts.The date code on the bottom of the battery case is 1 3 1 23 so perhaps Jan 31, 2023?The code printed on the cap of the battery is 23F180283 so likely 2023 and either date code, serial number, or other manufacturing traceability number.Nicely packed, good price, and a 5 star battery in my opinion.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comparable To Others I Have Used
reviews.reviewText: I have several battery backup units and a home alarm system that use this size replacement battery. Typically, I get about four to five years out of one before it needs to be replaced. This battery seems to an exact duplicate of others I have purchased over the years.My alarm system battery is already 4 years old, so I went ahead and replaced it with this unit. I waited a couple of days after installing it and then killed the power to our system. The battery kept everything powered up, so it seems to work well. Obviously, there is no way to gauge longevity yet, but I see nothing that would indicate it not lasting as long as others I have purchased over the years.
